story_summary: Fetyukovitch delivered a passionate speech that moved the audience to tears, but Ippolit Kirillovitch objected with a critical and emotional rebuttal. Mitya spoke briefly, proclaiming his innocence and expressing humility and submission before the jury retired to deliberate. The jury returned a unanimous guilty verdict, shocking the court and provoking an emotional outburst from Mitya and Grushenka, while the sentencing was postponed until the next day.
evidence_quotes: The orator himself was genuinely touched.
The foreman of the jury... pronounced, in a clear, loud voice: 'Yes, guilty!'
